title: How can I set up a unique notification tone for when I receive new SMS messages?
answer: Go to Messaging > Menu > Settings > General > Tone to set up. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140393)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140394) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140395) []()![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140396) The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
